  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3067</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3067</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura. El teatre popular: passions i pastorets</string>
            <string language="en">Literature. Popular theatre: Passion plays and Nativity plays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur. Populäres Theater: 
Passionsspiele und Nativityspiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature. Théâtre populaire : 
Jeux de passion et jeux de nativity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura. Theatre popular: Jogos de
paixão e jogos da natividade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura. Teatro popolare: Giochi 
di passione e giochi del nativity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία. Δημοφιλές θέατρο: Παιχνίδια 
πάθους και παιχνίδια Nativity</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta el tema del teatre en llengua catalana. S'hi estudien els orígens del teatre popular, La Passió i Els pastorets. S'hi presenten textos de La Passió i d'Els pastorets de Folch i Torres. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on the theatre in Catalan, including the origins of popular theatre (Passion plays and Nativity plays), with extracts by Folch i Torres.  Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió del text</string>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión del texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf dem Theater auf 
katalanisch, einschließlich die Ursprung des populären Theaters 
(Passionsspiele und Nativityspiele), mit Extrakten durch Folch I 
Torres. Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis 
eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur le théâtre dans le 
catalan, y compris les origines du théâtre populaire (jeux de 
passion et jeux de nativity), avec des extraits par Folch i Torres. 
Des activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses 
pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo no theatre no catalan, 
including as origens do theatre popular (jogos de paixão e jogos da 
natividade), com extratos por Folch i Torres. As atividades do 
self-assessment são incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva sul teatro nel catalan, 
compreso le origini del teatro popolare (giochi di passione e giochi 
del nativity), con gli estratti da Folch i Torres. Le attività 
di valutazione di se stesso egualmente sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στο θέατρο στα 
καταλανικά, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της προέλευσης του δημοφιλούς 
θεάτρου (παιχνίδια πάθους και παιχνίδια Nativity), με τα 
αποσπάσματα από Folch ι Torres. Οι δραστηριότητες 
αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverständnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">genre littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension des textes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genre literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">genere letterario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione del testo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνικό ύφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
